extDescription.message: Provides structure to inject the Discord client with custom CSS and JS in the form of plugins.

warpWebapp.message: Warp to the Webapp from here

optionSelUpdate.message: Refresh rate for guild/channel switch detecting

optionTab.message: Interval to update tab data cache

optionReloadDiscord.message: Reload all tabs with Discord when the extension is (re)loaded

fsTooltip.message: Press Enter to add URL - Supports GitHub/Gist/GitLab Links

dragAndDrop.message: Drap & Drop files to add them as themes and plugins!

errNotOK.message: Failed to request URL, check console!

errFailFetch.message: Failed to fetch URL, Either it's unreachable or CORS is disabled!

errCommandNoName.message: Cannot instantiate a command without a name!

errPluginDeps.message: A plugin must have an author, version, and description
